info.description: An Open API for parking lot management
info.title: JParker REST API

tags.name: parking-lot-controller
tags.description: Operations pertaining to parking lots in Parking Lot Management System

get.summary: View a list of all parking lots

401.description: You are not authorized to view the resource

403.description: Accessing the resource you were trying to reach is forbidden

404.description: The resource you were trying to reach is not found

get.summary: Get a parking lot by Id

parameters.name: lotId
parameters.description: ParkingLot id from which parking object will retrieve

get.summary: Get a list of free slots in a parking lot

parameters.name: lotId
parameters.description: ParkingLot id from which parking slots will be retrieved

parameters.name: parkingSlotType
parameters.description: Specify parking slot type to be used (twentyKw, fiftyKw or sedan)

post.summary: Put a car in a any free parking slot

parameters.name: lotId
parameters.description: ParkingLot id from which parking slot will be retrieved

409.description: Somebody took the slot before you

put.summary: Remove car from parking lot and bill the customer

parameters.name: lotId
parameters.description: ParkingLot id from which parking slot will be retrieved

parameters.name: useId
parameters.description: Occupation id provided when entered the parking lot

409.description: Somebody took the slot before you

id.description: The database generated parking lot ID

name.description: The name of the parking lot

slots.description: All the slots of the parking lot

location.description: The slot location in the parking lot

status.description: The status of the parking slot

type.description: The type of the parking slot

carPowerType.description: The power type of the car using the slot

currencyCode.description: The currency code for billed price

endTime.description: The time when occupation has ended

formattedPrice.description: The billed price in human readable format

id.description: The database generated slot occupation item ID

price.description: The billed price for this occupation

startTime.description: The time when occupation has started
